waypoints:
if player.Race ~= 0 or player.Class2 ~= -1 then error("This waypoint file is for a new single classed Human character.",0) end if not __WPL.ResumePoint then local _NPC = player:findNearestNameOrId(110484) -- Find Laif Cindai near Pioneer's Colonyfor reference. if not (_NPC and 100 > distance(_NPC, player)) then error("Not at Human starting point in Howling Mountains!",0) end __WPL:setWaypointIndex(1) end function getSupplies() if getQuestStatus(420064) == "incomplete" then supplies = player:findNearestNameOrId({110080,110433}) if supplies and 150 > distance(supplies.X, supplies.Z, player.X, player.Z) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(supplies.X, supplies.Z), true) player:target_Object(supplies.Id) yrest(3000) end end killForQuest(false, 100061, 420531) end function checkBackpacks() if getQuestStatus(420065) == "incomplete" then -- Habits of the Kobolds inventory:update() local _numBags = inventory:itemTotalCount(200167) -- Kobold Backpack if _numBags > 0 then for _openBags= 1,_numBags do inventory:useItem(200167) -- Kobold Backpack end end end end
